name: Scanit
description:
You're a clerk at Beasty's store. It is your task to scan the items of each customer. However, as of late, their spending habits have become rather strange. Why are they buying grenades? Who are the viper gang? In order to find out you must ROTATE the items, FIND the barcode and... SCANIT!

Scanit was created as part of our education at the University of Skövde.
